titleStmt.title: Nordamerika 1893, S. 400
Nordamerika. Handbuch für Reisende: Digitale Ausgabe
titleStmt.author: Karl Baedeker (company)

publicationStmt.publisher: Austrian Centre for Digital Humanities, Austrian Academy of Sciences

sourceDesc.bibl: Nordamerika Die Vereinigten Staaten nebst einem Ausflug nach Mexiko Handbuch für Reisende von K. Bædeker Mit 17 Karten, 22 Plänen und 2 Grundrissen Leipzig Verlag von Karl Bædeker 1893

monogr.author: Karl Baedeker
monogr.title: Nordamerika Die Vereinigten Staaten nebst einem Ausglug nach Mexiko
Handbuch für Reisende von K. Bædeker Mit 17 Karten, 22 Plänen und 2 Grundrissen

projectDesc.p: Image creation, optical character recognition and basic XML annotation has been carried out within the framework of the AAC-Austrian Academy Corpus.

Transformation to TEI/P5, linguistic and semantic annotation has been applied within the the GO!DIGITAL 1.0 project "travel!digital. Exploring People and Monuments in Baedeker Guidebooks (1875-1914)", Project-Nr.: ÖAW0204.

prefixDef.p: Private URIs using the person prefix are pointers to person elements in the personography.xml file. For example, psn:MDH dereferences to personography.xml#MDH
Private URIs using the t prefix are pointers to entries in the travel!digital thesaurus. For example, t:Concept6005600 dereferences to https://vocabs.acdh.oeaw.ac.at/traveldigital/Concept6005600.

correction.p: Corrections have been represented using markup.

hyphenation.p: All end-of-line hyphenation has been retained.

interpretation.p: personal names of historical, mythological/religious and literary figures (except occurences in street names and company names), dates, selected designations of groups and sights
tokenization, PoS-tagging (Stuttgart-Tübingen-TagSet, 54 part-of-speech tags for annotating German text corpora, Guidelines 1999), lemmatization, manually corrected

div.n: Umgebungen: Sutro Heights. Cliff House. Seal Rocks. Mt. San Bruno. Alcatraz und Mare Islands. San Franciso Bay. Sausalito. Mt. Tamalpais
Von Tiburon nach Ukiah. San Rafael. Geyser Springs. Alameda. Calistoga. Mt. St. Helena. Mt. Diablo
